transcripts.text: Hey everybody, thanks for watching our YouTube channel.

And they have a whole history, of course, the Persian Empire and the Old Testament.  Remember, you've got the Medes and the Persians after the Babylonians defeated them.  Iran has had a really fascinating history.  But what's amazing, Greg, In Ezekiel chapter 38, it talks about a coalition in the last days.  Persia is mentioned, and along with another character, Rosh, which seems to be a proper noun referring to the present country of Russia, and having a military alliance.  Never in the history of the human race has there been a military alliance between those two geographical entities, there which is modern-day Iran and modern-day Russia, until now. But they have a view of the last days, a prophetic view, that a final Imam or Mahdi will come, who is basically, you know, the 12th one.

Yeah, the messiah.  And they will know he's there by the fact that he kills the Christians and the Jews and then sets up this worldwide caliphate.
